    URL "https://github.com/cpp-pm/hunter/archive/v0.23.297.tar.gz"
    SHA1 "3319fe6a3b08090df7df98dee75134d68e2ef5a3"
)
#while we're at it: EXTERNAL CODE, all lines of this file which weren't copypasted by me were autogenerated by QT creator (except very few)

project(mitm LANGUAGES CXX)

set(CMAKE_INCLUDE_CURRENT_DIR ON)

set(CMAKE_AUTOUIC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTOMOC ON)
set(CMAKE_AUTORCC ON)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)

find_package(QT NAMES Qt6 Qt5 COMPONENTS Core LinguistTools Network REQUIRED)
find_package(Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR} COMPONENTS Core LinguistTools Network REQUIRED)

set(TS_FILES mitm_en_GB.ts)

#EXTERNAL CODE these 2 lines were copypasted from somewhere
hunter_add_package(OpenSSL)
find_package(OpenSSL REQUIRED)

#EXTERNAL CODE from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/9017573/define-preprocessor-macro-through-cmake#9017635
add_compile_definitions(SRCDIR=\"${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}\")

add_executable(mitm
  main.cpp
  proxyserversocket.cpp
  serversidetcpsocket.cpp
  sslstuff.cpp
  mystdio.cpp
  ${TS_FILES}
)
target_link_libraries(mitm PUBLIC OpenSSL::SSL OpenSSL::Crypto Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Core Qt${QT_VERSION_MAJOR}::Network)

if(COMMAND qt_create_translation)
    qt_create_translation(QM_FILES ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR} ${TS_FILES})
else()
    qt5_create_translation(QM_FILES ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR} ${TS_FILES})
endif()
